column4: Hello all, I reinstalled, keeping my home partition and now get the following error when I try to log in:
unable to launch "gnome-2d" X session --- "gnome-2d" not  found; falling back to default session.
Does anyone have any advice on getting X to start-up?
just try out to login to a console (CTRL+F1) and as a super user try the command startx
